definitions.definition: Having to do with or arranged in a series .
Who performs a specified action or course of action repeatedly or regularly.
examples: The serial killer had a string of victims across seven states.
He was a serial entrepreneur, always coming up with a new way to make cash.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to a grammatical aspect relating to an action that is habitual and ongoing .

main_definition: Having to do with or arranged in a series .
secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Who performs a specified action or course of action repeatedly or regularly.
( grammar ) Of or relating to a grammatical aspect relating to an action that is habitual and ongoing .
